                        <item>
            <title><![CDATA[Fewer-than-expected number of Americans filed jobless claims last week, as layoffs remain low]]></title>
            <link>https://www.pbs.org/newshour/economy/fewer-than-expected-number-of-americans-filed-jobless-claims-last-week-as-layoffs-remain-low</link>
            <description><![CDATA[U.S. filings for jobless aid for the week ending Jan. 10 fell by 9,000 to 198,000, down from 207,000 the previous week, the Labor Department reported Thursday. The figure was significantly less than the 215,000 that analysts polled by the data firm FactSet were expecting.]]></description>
            <pubDate>Thu, 15 Jan 2026 14:58:14 -0500</pubDate>
            <guid isPermaLink="true">https://www.pbs.org/newshour/economy/fewer-than-expected-number-of-americans-filed-jobless-claims-last-week-as-layoffs-remain-low</guid>
                        <category domain="https://www.pbs.org/newshour/tag/hiring"><![CDATA[hiring]]></category>
                        <category domain="https://www.pbs.org/newshour/tag/jobless-claims"><![CDATA[jobless claims]]></category>
                        <category domain="https://www.pbs.org/newshour/tag/jobs"><![CDATA[jobs]]></category>
                        <category domain="https://www.pbs.org/newshour/tag/labor-department"><![CDATA[Labor Department]]></category>
                        <category domain="https://www.pbs.org/newshour/tag/layoffs"><![CDATA[layoffs]]></category>
                        <category domain="https://www.pbs.org/newshour/tag/unemployment"><![CDATA[unemployment]]></category>
                                                        <dc:creator><![CDATA[Matt Ott, Associated Press]]></dc:creator>
                                                                <media:content url="https://d3i6fh83elv35t.cloudfront.net/newshour/app/uploads/2016/06/RTX2H3E8-1024x672.jpg" medium="image" width="1024" height="672" />
                    </item>
                <item>
            <title><![CDATA[European troops arrive in Greenland as talks with U.S. highlight 'disagreement' over island's future]]></title>
            <link>https://www.pbs.org/newshour/world/european-troops-arrive-in-greenland-as-talks-with-u-s-highlight-disagreement-over-islands-future</link>
            <description><![CDATA[The troop movements were intended to portray unity among Europeans and send a signal to President Donald Trump that an American takeover of Greenland is not necessary as NATO together can safeguard the security of the Arctic region amid rising Russian and Chinese interest.]]></description>
            <pubDate>Thu, 15 Jan 2026 14:52:12 -0500</pubDate>
            <guid isPermaLink="true">https://www.pbs.org/newshour/world/european-troops-arrive-in-greenland-as-talks-with-u-s-highlight-disagreement-over-islands-future</guid>
                        <category domain="https://www.pbs.org/newshour/tag/denmark"><![CDATA[Denmark]]></category>
                        <category domain="https://www.pbs.org/newshour/tag/donald-trump"><![CDATA[Donald Trump news]]></category>
                        <category domain="https://www.pbs.org/newshour/tag/greenland"><![CDATA[greenland]]></category>
                                                        <dc:creator><![CDATA[Emma Burrows, Associated Press]]></dc:creator>
                                <dc:creator><![CDATA[Claudia Ciobanu, Associated Press]]></dc:creator>
                                <dc:creator><![CDATA[Daniel Niemann, Associated Press]]></dc:creator>
                                                                <media:content url="https://d3i6fh83elv35t.cloudfront.net/static/2026/01/2026-01-15T105345Z_1473113221_RC2C1JA0LH23_RTRMADP_3_USA-TRUMP-GREENLAND-DENMARK-MILITARY-1024x683.jpg" medium="image" width="1024" height="683" />
                    </item>
                <item>
            <title><![CDATA[U.S. seizes sixth sanctioned tanker it says has ties to Venezuela in Trump's effort to control its oil]]></title>
            <link>https://www.pbs.org/newshour/world/u-s-seizes-sixth-sanctioned-tanker-it-says-has-ties-to-venezuela-in-trumps-effort-to-control-its-oil</link>
            <description><![CDATA[U.S. forces in the Caribbean Sea have seized another sanctioned oil tanker that the Trump administration says has ties to Venezuela, part of a broader U.S. effort to take control of the South American country's oil.]]></description>
            <pubDate>Thu, 15 Jan 2026 14:16:35 -0500</pubDate>
            <guid isPermaLink="true">https://www.pbs.org/newshour/world/u-s-seizes-sixth-sanctioned-tanker-it-says-has-ties-to-venezuela-in-trumps-effort-to-control-its-oil</guid>
                        <category domain="https://www.pbs.org/newshour/tag/kristi-noem"><![CDATA[Kristi Noem]]></category>
                        <category domain="https://www.pbs.org/newshour/tag/oil-tankers"><![CDATA[oil tankers]]></category>
                        <category domain="https://www.pbs.org/newshour/tag/u-s-southern-command"><![CDATA[U.S. Southern Command]]></category>
                        <category domain="https://www.pbs.org/newshour/tag/venezuela"><![CDATA[venezuela]]></category>
                                                        <dc:creator><![CDATA[Konstantin Toropin, Associated Press]]></dc:creator>
                                <dc:creator><![CDATA[Michael Biesecker, Associated Press]]></dc:creator>
                                                                <media:content url="https://d3i6fh83elv35t.cloudfront.net/static/2026/01/2026-01-15T153022Z_891096838_RC2Q1JABM35B_RTRMADP_3_USA-VENEZUELA-TANKER-SEIZE-1024x665.jpg" medium="image" width="1024" height="665" />
                    </item>
                <item>
            <title><![CDATA[Judge clears way for New York offshore wind project, handing industry another victory against Trump]]></title>
            <link>https://www.pbs.org/newshour/nation/judge-clears-way-for-new-york-offshore-wind-project-handing-industry-another-victory-against-trump</link>
            <description><![CDATA[District Judge Carl J. Nichols, an appointee of President Donald Trump, faulted the government for not responding to key points in Empire Wind's court filings, including the contention that the administration violated proper procedure.]]></description>
            <pubDate>Thu, 15 Jan 2026 12:35:17 -0500</pubDate>
            <guid isPermaLink="true">https://www.pbs.org/newshour/nation/judge-clears-way-for-new-york-offshore-wind-project-handing-industry-another-victory-against-trump</guid>
                        <category domain="https://www.pbs.org/newshour/tag/new-york"><![CDATA[New York]]></category>
                        <category domain="https://www.pbs.org/newshour/tag/offshore-wind"><![CDATA[offshore wind]]></category>
                        <category domain="https://www.pbs.org/newshour/tag/wind-power"><![CDATA[wind power]]></category>
                                                        <dc:creator><![CDATA[Michael Phillis, Associated Press]]></dc:creator>
                                <dc:creator><![CDATA[Jennifer McDermott, Associated Press]]></dc:creator>
                                                                <media:content url="https://d3i6fh83elv35t.cloudfront.net/static/2026/01/2025-09-23T225733Z_836779837_RC2TXGAT5DF5_RTRMADP_3_USA-COURT-ORSTED-REVOLUTION-1024x683.jpg" medium="image" width="1024" height="683" />
                    </item>
                <item>
            <title><![CDATA[Federal judges allow California to use new U.S. House map ahead of 2026 midterms]]></title>
            <link>https://www.pbs.org/newshour/politics/federal-judges-allow-california-to-use-new-u-s-house-map-ahead-of-2026-midterms</link>
            <description><![CDATA[The ruling is a victory for Democrats in the state-by-state mid-decade redistricting battle that could help determine which party wins control of the U.S. House in 2026.]]></description>
            <pubDate>Thu, 15 Jan 2026 12:10:04 -0500</pubDate>
            <guid isPermaLink="true">https://www.pbs.org/newshour/politics/federal-judges-allow-california-to-use-new-u-s-house-map-ahead-of-2026-midterms</guid>
                        <category domain="https://www.pbs.org/newshour/tag/california"><![CDATA[california]]></category>
                        <category domain="https://www.pbs.org/newshour/tag/congressional-maps"><![CDATA[congressional maps]]></category>
                        <category domain="https://www.pbs.org/newshour/tag/congressional-redistricting"><![CDATA[congressional redistricting]]></category>
                        <category domain="https://www.pbs.org/newshour/tag/elections"><![CDATA[elections]]></category>
                        <category domain="https://www.pbs.org/newshour/tag/proposition-50"><![CDATA[proposition 50]]></category>
                        <category domain="https://www.pbs.org/newshour/tag/u-s-house"><![CDATA[U.S. House]]></category>
                        <category domain="https://www.pbs.org/newshour/tag/vote-2026"><![CDATA[Vote 2026]]></category>
                                                        <dc:creator><![CDATA[Trân Nguyễn, Associated Press]]></dc:creator>
                                                                <media:content url="https://d3i6fh83elv35t.cloudfront.net/static/2026/01/2025-10-04T211334Z_626654880_RC255HAA24HR_RTRMADP_3_USA-ELECTION-CALIFORNIA-1024x683.jpg" medium="image" width="1024" height="683" />
                    </item>
                <item>
            <title><![CDATA[Trump set to meet Venezuelan opposition leader Machado]]></title>
            <link>https://www.pbs.org/newshour/world/trump-set-to-meet-venezuelan-opposition-leader-machado</link>
            <description><![CDATA[The meeting comes as President Donald Trump and his top advisers have signaled their willingness to work with acting President Delcy Rodríguez, who was Maduro's vice president and along with others in the deposed leader's inner circle remain in charge of day-to-day governmental operations.]]></description>
            <pubDate>Thu, 15 Jan 2026 11:54:57 -0500</pubDate>
            <guid isPermaLink="true">https://www.pbs.org/newshour/world/trump-set-to-meet-venezuelan-opposition-leader-machado</guid>
                        <category domain="https://www.pbs.org/newshour/tag/donald-trump"><![CDATA[Donald Trump news]]></category>
                        <category domain="https://www.pbs.org/newshour/tag/maria-corina-machado"><![CDATA[Maria Corina Machado]]></category>
                        <category domain="https://www.pbs.org/newshour/tag/venezuela"><![CDATA[venezuela]]></category>
                                                        <dc:creator><![CDATA[Regina Garcia Cano, Associated Press]]></dc:creator>
                                <dc:creator><![CDATA[Megan Janetsky, Associated Press]]></dc:creator>
                                                                <media:content url="https://d3i6fh83elv35t.cloudfront.net/static/2026/01/2026-01-15T162232Z_1862232863_RC29EIALTD1I_RTRMADP_3_USA-TRUMP-VENEZUELA-1024x706.jpg" medium="image" width="1024" height="706" />
                    </item>
                <item>
            <title><![CDATA[Ailing astronaut returns to Earth from space station early in NASA's first medical evacuation]]></title>
            <link>https://www.pbs.org/newshour/science/ailing-astronaut-returns-to-earth-from-space-station-early-in-nasas-first-medical-evacuation</link>
            <description><![CDATA[It was an unexpected finish to a mission that began in August and left the International Space Station with only one American and two Russians on board.]]></description>
            <pubDate>Thu, 15 Jan 2026 11:48:39 -0500</pubDate>
            <guid isPermaLink="true">https://www.pbs.org/newshour/science/ailing-astronaut-returns-to-earth-from-space-station-early-in-nasas-first-medical-evacuation</guid>
                        <category domain="https://www.pbs.org/newshour/tag/astronauts"><![CDATA[astronauts]]></category>
                        <category domain="https://www.pbs.org/newshour/tag/International-Space-Station"><![CDATA[International Space Station]]></category>
                        <category domain="https://www.pbs.org/newshour/tag/nasa"><![CDATA[NASA]]></category>
                        <category domain="https://www.pbs.org/newshour/tag/spacex"><![CDATA[SpaceX]]></category>
                                                        <dc:creator><![CDATA[Marcia Dunn, Associated Press]]></dc:creator>
                                                                <media:content url="https://d3i6fh83elv35t.cloudfront.net/static/2026/01/crew-11-in-dragon-jan-15-1024x629.jpg" medium="image" width="1024" height="629" />
                    </item>
                <item>
            <title><![CDATA[WATCH LIVE: Georgia Gov. Brian Kemp's 2026 State of the State address]]></title>
            <link>https://www.pbs.org/newshour/politics/watch-live-georgia-gov-brian-kemps-2026-state-of-the-state-address</link>
            <description><![CDATA[Kemp will deliver his final State of the State address Thursday before a joint session of the state's General Assembly. The governor will outline priorities for his administration's final legislative session.]]></description>
            <pubDate>Thu, 15 Jan 2026 11:35:09 -0500</pubDate>
            <guid isPermaLink="true">https://www.pbs.org/newshour/politics/watch-live-georgia-gov-brian-kemps-2026-state-of-the-state-address</guid>
                        <category domain="https://www.pbs.org/newshour/tag/brian-kemp"><![CDATA[brian kemp]]></category>
                        <category domain="https://www.pbs.org/newshour/tag/Georgia"><![CDATA[georgia]]></category>
                        <category domain="https://www.pbs.org/newshour/tag/state-of-the-state"><![CDATA[State of the State]]></category>
                                                        <dc:creator><![CDATA[Sarah Kallis, Georgia Public Broadcasting]]></dc:creator>
                                <dc:creator><![CDATA[Sandy Malcolm, Georgia Public Broadcasting]]></dc:creator>
                                                                <media:content url="https://d3i6fh83elv35t.cloudfront.net/static/2026/01/2025-02-21T010326Z_713455208_RC2OYCAR33W7_RTRMADP_3_USA-TRUMP-GOVERNORS-1024x641.jpg" medium="image" width="1024" height="641" />
                    </item>
                <item>
            <title><![CDATA[DHS says federal officer shot person in leg after being attacked during Minneapolis arrest]]></title>
            <link>https://www.pbs.org/newshour/nation/dhs-says-federal-officer-shot-person-in-leg-after-being-attacked-during-minneapolis-arrest</link>
            <description><![CDATA[A federal officer shot a man in the leg in Minneapolis after being attacked with a shovel and broom handle while trying to make an arrest Wednesday, officials said.]]></description>
            <pubDate>Thu, 15 Jan 2026 11:23:42 -0500</pubDate>
            <guid isPermaLink="true">https://www.pbs.org/newshour/nation/dhs-says-federal-officer-shot-person-in-leg-after-being-attacked-during-minneapolis-arrest</guid>
                        <category domain="https://www.pbs.org/newshour/tag/minneapolis"><![CDATA[minneapolis]]></category>
                        <category domain="https://www.pbs.org/newshour/tag/minnesota"><![CDATA[minnesota]]></category>
                        <category domain="https://www.pbs.org/newshour/tag/renee-good"><![CDATA[Renee Good]]></category>
                        <category domain="https://www.pbs.org/newshour/tag/u-s-immigration-and-customs-enforcement"><![CDATA[u.s. immigration and customs enforcement]]></category>
                                                        <dc:creator><![CDATA[Steve Karnowski, Associated Press]]></dc:creator>
                                <dc:creator><![CDATA[Alanna Durkin Richer, Associated Press]]></dc:creator>
                                                                <media:content url="https://d3i6fh83elv35t.cloudfront.net/static/2026/01/2026-01-15T155627Z_1555679481_RC2R1JATNSZI_RTRMADP_3_USA-TRUMP-MINNESOTA-1024x683.jpg" medium="image" width="1024" height="683" />
                    </item>
                <item>
            <title><![CDATA[Senators launch a cross-party effort to end stock trading by lawmakers]]></title>
            <link>https://www.pbs.org/newshour/politics/senators-launch-a-cross-party-effort-to-end-stock-trading-by-lawmakers</link>
            <description><![CDATA[Democratic Sen. Kirsten Gillibrand of New York and Republican Sen. Ashley Moody of Florida on Thursday plan to introduce legislation, first shared with The Associated Press, that would bar lawmakers and their immediate family members from trading or owning individual stocks.]]></description>
            <pubDate>Thu, 15 Jan 2026 11:16:44 -0500</pubDate>
            <guid isPermaLink="true">https://www.pbs.org/newshour/politics/senators-launch-a-cross-party-effort-to-end-stock-trading-by-lawmakers</guid>
                        <category domain="https://www.pbs.org/newshour/tag/ashley-moody"><![CDATA[Ashley Moody]]></category>
                        <category domain="https://www.pbs.org/newshour/tag/kirsten-gillibrand"><![CDATA[kirsten gillibrand]]></category>
                        <category domain="https://www.pbs.org/newshour/tag/senate"><![CDATA[senate]]></category>
                        <category domain="https://www.pbs.org/newshour/tag/stock-trading"><![CDATA[stock trading]]></category>
                        <category domain="https://www.pbs.org/newshour/tag/stocks"><![CDATA[stocks]]></category>
                                                        <dc:creator><![CDATA[Joey Cappelletti, Associated Press]]></dc:creator>
                                                                <media:content url="https://d3i6fh83elv35t.cloudfront.net/static/2026/01/2026-01-05T174853Z_836222398_RC21VIACCDQR_RTRMADP_3_USA-VENEZUELA-1024x697.jpg" medium="image" width="1024" height="697" />
                    </item>
                <item>
            <title><![CDATA[WATCH: White House briefing addresses Machado meeting, Insurrection Act threat]]></title>
            <link>https://www.pbs.org/newshour/politics/watch-live-white-house-news-briefing-may-address-machado-meeting-insurrection-act-threat</link>
            <description><![CDATA[President Donald Trump threatened to invoke the Insurrection Act to deploy military in Minneapolis on Thursday.]]></description>
            <pubDate>Thu, 15 Jan 2026 10:44:52 -0500</pubDate>
            <guid isPermaLink="true">https://www.pbs.org/newshour/politics/watch-live-white-house-news-briefing-may-address-machado-meeting-insurrection-act-threat</guid>
                        <category domain="https://www.pbs.org/newshour/tag/donald-trump"><![CDATA[Donald Trump news]]></category>
                        <category domain="https://www.pbs.org/newshour/tag/karoline-leavitt"><![CDATA[karoline leavitt]]></category>
                        <category domain="https://www.pbs.org/newshour/tag/minnesota"><![CDATA[minnesota]]></category>
                        <category domain="https://www.pbs.org/newshour/tag/venezuela"><![CDATA[venezuela]]></category>
                                                        <dc:creator><![CDATA[Associated Press]]></dc:creator>
                                                                <media:content url="https://d3i6fh83elv35t.cloudfront.net/static/2026/01/2026-01-12T190742Z_2001846744_RC2IZIAUDCJ3_RTRMADP_3_USA-TRUMP-1024x688.jpg" medium="image" width="1024" height="688" />
                    </item>
                <item>
            <title><![CDATA[Trump threatens to use Insurrection Act to put down protests in Minneapolis]]></title>
            <link>https://www.pbs.org/newshour/politics/trump-threatens-to-use-insurrection-act-to-put-down-protests-in-minneapolis</link>
            <description><![CDATA[President Donald Trump has repeatedly threatened to invoke the rarely used federal law to deploy the U.S. military or federalize the National Guard for domestic law enforcement, over the objections of state governors.]]></description>
            <pubDate>Thu, 15 Jan 2026 09:29:05 -0500</pubDate>
            <guid isPermaLink="true">https://www.pbs.org/newshour/politics/trump-threatens-to-use-insurrection-act-to-put-down-protests-in-minneapolis</guid>
                        <category domain="https://www.pbs.org/newshour/tag/donald-trump"><![CDATA[Donald Trump news]]></category>
                        <category domain="https://www.pbs.org/newshour/tag/insurrection-act"><![CDATA[Insurrection Act]]></category>
                        <category domain="https://www.pbs.org/newshour/tag/jacob-frey"><![CDATA[Jacob Frey]]></category>
                        <category domain="https://www.pbs.org/newshour/tag/minneapolis"><![CDATA[minneapolis]]></category>
                        <category domain="https://www.pbs.org/newshour/tag/minnesota"><![CDATA[minnesota]]></category>
                        <category domain="https://www.pbs.org/newshour/tag/renee-good"><![CDATA[Renee Good]]></category>
                        <category domain="https://www.pbs.org/newshour/tag/tim-walz"><![CDATA[Tim Walz]]></category>
                                                        <dc:creator><![CDATA[Steve Karnowski, Associated Press]]></dc:creator>
                                <dc:creator><![CDATA[Alanna Durkin Richer, Associated Press]]></dc:creator>
                                <dc:creator><![CDATA[Hallie Golden, Associated Press]]></dc:creator>
                                <dc:creator><![CDATA[Aamer Madhani, Associated Press]]></dc:creator>
                                                                <media:content url="https://d3i6fh83elv35t.cloudfront.net/static/2026/01/2026-01-15T080952Z_971706225_RC2G1JA0SWZ5_RTRMADP_3_USA-TRUMP-MINNESOTA-1024x683.jpg" medium="image" width="1024" height="683" />
                    </item>
                <item>
            <title><![CDATA[WATCH: Trump won't say what he is 'willing to do' to take control of Greenland]]></title>
            <link>https://www.pbs.org/newshour/politics/watch-trump-wont-say-what-he-is-willing-to-do-to-take-control-of-greenland</link>
            <description><![CDATA[Trump said that he "can't rely on Denmark being able to fend" off global threats. "The problem is there's not a thing that Denmark can do about it if Russia or China wants to occupy Greenland, but there's everything we can do," he said.]]></description>
            <pubDate>Wed, 14 Jan 2026 18:57:36 -0500</pubDate>
            <guid isPermaLink="true">https://www.pbs.org/newshour/politics/watch-trump-wont-say-what-he-is-willing-to-do-to-take-control-of-greenland</guid>
                        <category domain="https://www.pbs.org/newshour/tag/denmark"><![CDATA[Denmark]]></category>
                        <category domain="https://www.pbs.org/newshour/tag/donald-trump"><![CDATA[Donald Trump news]]></category>
                        <category domain="https://www.pbs.org/newshour/tag/greenland"><![CDATA[greenland]]></category>
                        <category domain="https://www.pbs.org/newshour/tag/nato"><![CDATA[NATO]]></category>
                                                        <dc:creator><![CDATA[Liz Landers]]></dc:creator>
                                <dc:creator><![CDATA[Dan Cooney]]></dc:creator>
                                                                <media:content url="https://d3i6fh83elv35t.cloudfront.net/static/2026/01/2026-01-14T203309Z_1370486412_RC281JADDWOT_RTRMADP_3_USA-TRUMP-1024x713.jpg" medium="image" width="1024" height="713" />
                    </item>
                <item>
            <title><![CDATA[Iran protests have eased after government's brutal crackdown, activist says]]></title>
            <link>https://www.pbs.org/newshour/show/iran-protests-have-eased-after-governments-brutal-crackdown-activist-says</link>
            <description><![CDATA[For days, the Middle East has been on edge, witnessing unprecedented protests in Iran, a deadly crackdown by Iranian authorities and threats to intervene by President Trump. But now, Trump says Iran's crackdown has eased and suggested his focus is no longer a military strike. Nick Schifrin reports.]]></description>
            <pubDate>Wed, 14 Jan 2026 18:55:32 -0500</pubDate>
            <guid isPermaLink="true">https://www.pbs.org/newshour/show/iran-protests-have-eased-after-governments-brutal-crackdown-activist-says</guid>
                        <category domain="https://www.pbs.org/newshour/tag/donald-trump"><![CDATA[Donald Trump news]]></category>
                        <category domain="https://www.pbs.org/newshour/tag/iran"><![CDATA[Iran]]></category>
                        <category domain="https://www.pbs.org/newshour/tag/iran-protests"><![CDATA[iran protests]]></category>
                                                        <dc:creator><![CDATA[Nick Schifrin]]></dc:creator>
                                <dc:creator><![CDATA[Zeba Warsi]]></dc:creator>
                                                                <media:content url="https://d3i6fh83elv35t.cloudfront.net/static/2026/01/IranUprising-2-1024x683.jpg" medium="image" width="1024" height="683" />
                    </item>
                <item>
            <title><![CDATA[A look at the strategic importance of Greenland as Trump escalates threats]]></title>
            <link>https://www.pbs.org/newshour/show/a-look-at-the-strategic-importance-of-greenland-as-trump-escalates-threats</link>
            <description><![CDATA[President Trump said that he hoped for a resolution on his threat to annex Greenland. But disagreements remain following Vice President Vance and Secretary of State Rubio meeting with the foreign ministers of Denmark and Greenland at the White House. Amna Nawaz discussed the latest with Rob Bauer, the former chair of the NATO Military Committee.]]></description>
            <pubDate>Wed, 14 Jan 2026 18:50:23 -0500</pubDate>
            <guid isPermaLink="true">https://www.pbs.org/newshour/show/a-look-at-the-strategic-importance-of-greenland-as-trump-escalates-threats</guid>
                        <category domain="https://www.pbs.org/newshour/tag/denmark"><![CDATA[Denmark]]></category>
                        <category domain="https://www.pbs.org/newshour/tag/donald-trump"><![CDATA[Donald Trump news]]></category>

                <item>
            <title><![CDATA[News Wrap: U.S. suspending visa applications from 75 countries]]></title>
            <link>https://www.pbs.org/newshour/show/news-wrap-u-s-suspending-visa-applications-from-75-countries</link>
            <description><![CDATA[In our news wrap Wednesday, the Trump administration is suspending the processing of visa applications for 75 countries, Michigan Sen. Elissa Slotkin says she is under federal investigation for her involvement in a video telling troops to resist illegal orders and the Supreme Court revived a GOP challenge to an Illinois law that allows mail-in ballots to be counted after Election Day.]]></description>
            <pubDate>Wed, 14 Jan 2026 18:45:31 -0500</pubDate>
            <guid isPermaLink="true">https://www.pbs.org/newshour/show/news-wrap-u-s-suspending-visa-applications-from-75-countries</guid>

                                                            <media:content url="https://d3i6fh83elv35t.cloudfront.net/static/2026/01/NewsWrap-14-1024x683.jpg" medium="image" width="1024" height="683" />
                    </item>
                <item>
            <title><![CDATA[Twin Cities on edge as ICE raids ignite fear and protests]]></title>
            <link>https://www.pbs.org/newshour/show/twin-cities-on-edge-as-ice-raids-ignite-fear-and-protests</link>
            <description><![CDATA[It's been just over a week since an ICE agent fatally shot 37-year-old Renee Good in Minneapolis, touching off large protests in the Twin Cities and nationwide. Since then, the presence of immigration enforcement officials has only grown, leaving Minnesota communities on edge. Special correspondent Fred de Sam Lazaro reports.]]></description>
            <pubDate>Wed, 14 Jan 2026 18:40:40 -0500</pubDate>
            <guid isPermaLink="true">https://www.pbs.org/newshour/show/twin-cities-on-edge-as-ice-raids-ignite-fear-and-protests</guid>

            <title><![CDATA[Minnesota AG says 'destructive' immigration raids are eroding trust in government]]></title>
            <link>https://www.pbs.org/newshour/show/minnesota-ag-says-destructive-immigration-raids-are-eroding-trust-in-government</link>
            <description><![CDATA[As the Trump administration's immigration operations continue in the Twin Cities, Amna Nawaz discussed the state response with Minnesota Attorney General Keith Ellison.]]></description>

                <item>
            <title><![CDATA[FBI searches reporter's home, raising concerns about intimidation of free press]]></title>
            <link>https://www.pbs.org/newshour/show/fbi-searches-reporters-home-raising-concerns-about-intimidation-of-free-press</link>
            <description><![CDATA[The FBI searched the home of a Washington Post reporter as part of an investigation involving a government contractor accused of mishandling classified information. Hannah Natanson has been reporting on President Trump's overhaul of the federal government. Press freedom advocates sharply criticized the search, saying it's a dangerous escalation. Geoff Bennett discussed more with Gabe Rottman.]]></description>
            <pubDate>Wed, 14 Jan 2026 18:30:01 -0500</pubDate>
            <guid isPermaLink="true">https://www.pbs.org/newshour/show/fbi-searches-reporters-home-raising-concerns-about-intimidation-of-free-press</guid>

                        <category domain="https://www.pbs.org/newshour/tag/washington-post"><![CDATA[Washington Post]]></category>
                                                        <dc:creator><![CDATA[Geoff Bennett]]></dc:creator>
                                <dc:creator><![CDATA[Karina Cuevas]]></dc:creator>
                                                                <media:content url="https://d3i6fh83elv35t.cloudfront.net/static/2026/01/JournalistRaided-1024x730.jpg" medium="image" width="1024" height="730" />
                    </item>
                <item>
            <title><![CDATA[GOP senators flip votes to squash Venezuela war powers resolution]]></title>
            <link>https://www.pbs.org/newshour/show/gop-senators-flip-votes-to-squash-venezuela-war-powers-resolution</link>
            <description><![CDATA[GOP leaders in the Senate squashed a Venezuela war powers resolution after five Republicans voted to advance the measure last week. Combined with articles of impeachment introduced against DHS Secretary Noem and threats to hold the Clintons in criminal contempt of Congress, it was a busy day on Capitol Hill. Congressional correspondent Lisa Desjardins reports.]]></description>
            <pubDate>Wed, 14 Jan 2026 18:25:50 -0500</pubDate>
            <guid isPermaLink="true">https://www.pbs.org/newshour/show/gop-senators-flip-votes-to-squash-venezuela-war-powers-resolution</guid>
